description: Shining in the Darkness is a dungeon crawler in a series full of strategy games.

0.0.1.description:
It exists. You'll need a dump of the USA/Europe version as base ROM. No options yet.

Let me know if anything breaks. I've only spent 3 days on this so far!
0.0.1.title: Shining in the Darkness 0.0.1

0.0.2.description:
This update has a few changes:
- Finding somebody else's item will now say "Found AP Item!" instead of awarding you 50 gold.
- Client should no longer award you the same item twice, hopefully
- Also it should report when you reach your goal properly
- YAML Options!
  - `gold_multi` and `xp_multi` to make your game faster
  - `goal` so you don't have to go all the way to Dark Sol
  - `useful_items` to specify how much of your items should be equipment

As always, please let me know about your experiences playing.
0.0.2.title: Shining in the Darkness 0.0.2

0.0.3.description: Quick fix to 0.0.2 that fixes the fill logic. Grab your new `.apworld` below.
0.0.3.title: Shining in the Darkness 0.0.3

0.0.4.description: This update adds the Minister's gift for forming a party and the King's gift for returning Jessa to the location/item pool.
0.0.4.title: Shining in the Darkness 0.0.4
